SEARCH

Class Client

java.lang.Object
Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Client extends Object implements Runnable
Threaded Client class to: establish connection with server, manage and update Swing GUI, and service client requests.
Version:
11 /1/2023 Fall/2023
Author:
Zachary Cowan

      private boolean isEditingUsername
      Flag for when username editing process is active. Used to determine which page content to render.

      private String chatContent
      Stores chat data and some server notifications

      private String serverContent
      Stores server dialogs like username prompting

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client() throws IOException
      Instantiates a new Client. Connects to server and stores socket object. Instantiates PrintWriter to write to socket output stream. Instantiates Buffered Reader to read socket input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException might be thrown if socket encounters and IO error.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Client main method. Instantiates a new client object and executes its run method. Client Object is designed to be distributable.
      Parameters:
      args - main args
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException might be thrown if socket encounters and IO error.

    • run

      public void run()
      Execution loop for thread where: GUI is created and managed, and messages are processed and sent.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • submitHandler

      private void submitHandler(JTextField input, JTextArea textArea, JFrame frame) throws IOException
      Handles cases when user submits a message via Enter key or Submit button. Preprocessing for username creation / editing process. Handles user quit request.
      Parameters:
      input - Input where user types messages.
      textArea - Area where messages are rendered.
      frame - Main JFrame passed for frame termination.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException might be thrown if socket encounters and IO error.

    • doClose

      private void doClose(JFrame frame) throws IOException
      Method to terminate all resources when client decides to quit or frame is closed.
      Parameters:
      frame - JFrame to be terminated
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException might be thrown if socket encounters and IO error.

    • getServerWelcomeMessage

      public static String getServerWelcomeMessage(String serverName)
      Gets server welcome message.
      Parameters:
      serverName - the server name
      Returns:
      the server welcome message
